audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by Industry or Sector :: Information Technology

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: Eclipse Public License

name: DiVA Open Source Project
short_description:
The goal of DiVA is to provide a new tool-supported methodology with an integrated framework for managing dynamic variability in adaptive systems. This goal will be addressed by combining aspect-oriented and model-driven techniques in an innovative way. It will test its results implementing case studies from two different domains: crisis management and Customer Relationship Management (CRM).

DiVA mobilises leading players within the domains of model-driven engineering, aspect-oriented analysis and modelling, variability modelling and partners that provide advanced end user systems and applications where the demand for adaptation is a major concern.
summary: DiVA: Dynamic Variability in complex, Adaptive systems
